resources.string: add this app “%1$s” into freeze list？
remove this app “%1$s” from freeze list？

"All the software" means the software in the system components, which is not recommended to freeze. It may cause problems such as the system crash or the system function is invalid. \n\n"user software" is a list of software installed by users. It can be frozen in general, but it may cause you to use the software that can run the service exception.
